original_text:
When she saw that she waited in vain,
    that her hope was lost,
she took another of her cubs
    and made him a young lion.
korean_text: 암사자가 기다리다가 소망이 끊어진 줄을 알고 그 새끼 하나를 또 골라 젊은 사자로 키웠더니

sentences.original_text: When she saw that she waited in vain,
she took another of her cubs
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자신의 새끼 중 다른 하나를 취하여

sentences.original_text: and made him a young lion.
